00042 #define INVALID_ARGUMENT_IF_NULL( A ) \
00043    if( A == NULL ) \
00044    { \
00045       return LADYBUG_INVALID_ARGUMENT; \
00046    } \
00047    \
00048 //=============================================================================
00049 //Define the size of JPEG Header 
00050 //=============================================================================
00051 #define IMAGE_HEADER_SIZE              0x148
00052 //=============================================================================
00053 //JPEG Header 
00054 //=============================================================================
00055 unsigned char arImageHead[IMAGE_HEADER_SIZE] = {
00056      0xFF,0xD8,0xFF,0xE0,0x00,0x10,0x4A,0x46, /* 000 */
00057      0x49,0x46,0x00,0x01,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x01, /* 008 */
00058      0x00,0x01,0x00,0x00,0xff,0xdb,0x00,0x43, /* 010 */
00059      0x00,0x0d,0x09,0x0a,0x0b,0x0a,0x08,0x0d, /* 018 : 19: Quantize */
00060      0x0b,0x0a,0x0b,0x0e,0x0e,0x0d,0x0f,0x13, /* 020 */
00061      0x20,0x15,0x13,0x12,0x12,0x13,0x27,0x1c, /* 028 */
00062      0x1e,0x17,0x20,0x2e,0x29,0x31,0x30,0x2e, /* 030 */
00063      0x29,0x2d,0x2c,0x33,0x3a,0x4a,0x3e,0x33, /* 038 */
00064      0x36,0x46,0x37,0x2c,0x2d,0x40,0x57,0x41, /* 040 */
00065      0x46,0x4c,0x4e,0x52,0x53,0x52,0x32,0x3e, /* 048 */
00066      0x5a,0x61,0x5a,0x50,0x60,0x4a,0x51,0x52, /* 050 */
00067      0x4f,0xff,0xc0,0x00,0x0b,0x08,0x00,0x20, /* 058 : 5E: HT (be) */
00068      0x00,0x20,0x01,0x01,0x11,0x00,0xFF,0xC4, /* 060 : 60: WD (be) */
00069      0x00,0x1F,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x05,0x01,0x01, /* 068 */
00070      0x01,0x01,0x01,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00, /* 070 */
00071      0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x02,0x03,0x04, /* 078 */
00072      0x05,0x06,0x07,0x08,0x09,0x0A,0x0B,0xFF, /* 080 */
00073      0xC4,0x00,0xB5,0x10,0x00,0x02,0x01,0x03, /* 088 */
00074      0x03,0x02,0x04,0x03,0x05,0x05,0x04,0x04, /* 090 */
00075      0x00,0x00,0x01,0x7D,0x01,0x02,0x03,0x00, /* 098 */
00076      0x04,0x11,0x05,0x12,0x21,0x31,0x41,0x06, /* 0A0 */
00077      0x13,0x51,0x61,0x07,0x22,0x71,0x14,0x32, /* 0A8 */
00078      0x81,0x91,0xA1,0x08,0x23,0x42,0xB1,0xC1, /* 0B0 */
00079      0x15,0x52,0xD1,0xF0,0x24,0x33,0x62,0x72, /* 0B8 */
00080      0x82,0x09,0x0A,0x16,0x17,0x18,0x19,0x1A, /* 0C0 */
00081      0x25,0x26,0x27,0x28,0x29,0x2A,0x34,0x35, /* 0C8 */
00082      0x36,0x37,0x38,0x39,0x3A,0x43,0x44,0x45, /* 0D0 */
00083      0x46,0x47,0x48,0x49,0x4A,0x53,0x54,0x55, /* 0D8 */
00084      0x56,0x57,0x58,0x59,0x5A,0x63,0x64,0x65, /* 0E0 */
00085      0x66,0x67,0x68,0x69,0x6A,0x73,0x74,0x75, /* 0E8 */
00086      0x76,0x77,0x78,0x79,0x7A,0x83,0x84,0x85, /* 0F0 */
00087      0x86,0x87,0x88,0x89,0x8A,0x92,0x93,0x94, /* 0F8 */
00088      0x95,0x96,0x97,0x98,0x99,0x9A,0xA2,0xA3, /* 100 */
00089      0xA4,0xA5,0xA6,0xA7,0xA8,0xA9,0xAA,0xB2, /* 108 */
00090      0xB3,0xB4,0xB5,0xB6,0xB7,0xB8,0xB9,0xBA, /* 110 */
00091      0xC2,0xC3,0xC4,0xC5,0xC6,0xC7,0xC8,0xC9, /* 118 */
00092      0xCA,0xD2,0xD3,0xD4,0xD5,0xD6,0xD7,0xD8, /* 120 */
00093      0xD9,0xDA,0xE1,0xE2,0xE3,0xE4,0xE5,0xE6, /* 128 */
00094      0xE7,0xE8,0xE9,0xEA,0xF1,0xF2,0xF3,0xF4, /* 130 */
00095      0xF5,0xF6,0xF7,0xF8,0xF9,0xFA,0xFF,0xDA, /* 138 */
00096      0x00,0x08,0x01,0x01,0x00,0x00,0x3F,0x00, /* 140 */
00097 };

00100 static __inline unsigned
00101 swab( unsigned num )
00102 {
00103    return (
00104       ( num>>24) |
00105       ( ( num & 0x00FF0000 ) >> 8 ) |
00106       ( ( num & 0x0000FF00 ) << 8 ) |
00107       (  num << 24 ) );
00108 }

00111 CompressorHeaderInfo::CompressorHeaderInfo()
00112 {
00113    m_iTotalSize = 0;
00114    m_iNumImages = 0;
00115    memset( &m_arInfo, 0x0, sizeof( ImageInfo ) * COMPRESSOR_HEADER_MAX_IMAGES );
00116 
00117    m_pDataStart = NULL;
00118 }

00123 }

00125 
00126 LadybugError 
00127 CompressorHeaderInfo::parseAndFillSize( LadybugImage* pimage, int bufferSize, int* receivedImageSize )
00128 {
00129    INVALID_ARGUMENT_IF_NULL( pimage );
00130 
00131    LadybugError error;
00132    if( ( error = parse( pimage->pData, getActualCols( pimage ), getActualRows( pimage ), bufferSize, receivedImageSize ) )
00133       != LADYBUG_OK )
00134    {
00135       return error;
00136    }
00137 
00138    pimage->uiDataSizeBytes = totalSize();
00139 
00140    return LADYBUG_OK;
00141 }

00145 CompressorHeaderInfo::totalSize() const
00146 {
00147    return m_iTotalSize;
00148 }

00151 int   
00152 CompressorHeaderInfo::images() const
00153 {

00157 
00158 int 
00159 CompressorHeaderInfo::getActualCols( const LadybugImage* pimage ) const
00160 {
00161    if( pimage == NULL )
00162    {
00163       assert( false );
00164       return 0;
00165    }
00166 
00167    if( pimage->uiCols == 0 || pimage->uiCols > 999999 )
00168    {
00169       assert( false );
00170       return 0;
00171    }
00172 
00173    switch( pimage->dataFormat )
00174    {
00175    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_INTERLEAVED:
00176       return pimage->uiCols;
00177       break;
00178    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_SEQUENTIAL:
00179       return pimage->uiCols;
00180       break;
00181    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_SEQUENTIAL_JPEG:
00182       return pimage->uiCols;
00183       break;
00184    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_COLOR_SEP_SEQUENTIAL:
00185       return pimage->uiCols / 2;
00186       break;
00187    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_COLOR_SEP_SEQUENTIAL_JPEG:
00188       return pimage->uiCols / 2;
00189       break;
00190    default:
00191       assert( false );
00192       return 0;
00193 
00194    }
00195 }
00196 
00197 int 
00198 CompressorHeaderInfo::getActualRows( const LadybugImage* pimage ) const
00199 {
00200    if( pimage == NULL )
00201    {
00202       assert( false );
00203       return 0;
00204    }
00205 
00206    if( pimage->uiRows == 0 || pimage->uiRows > 999999 )
00207    {
00208       assert( false );
00209       return 0;
00210    }
00211 
00212    switch( pimage->dataFormat )
00213    {
00214    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_INTERLEAVED:
00215    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_SEQUENTIAL:
00216    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_SEQUENTIAL_JPEG:
00217       return pimage->uiRows;
00218       break;
00219    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_COLOR_SEP_SEQUENTIAL:
00220    case LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_COLOR_SEP_SEQUENTIAL_JPEG:
00221       return pimage->uiRows / 2;
00222       break;
00223    default:
00224       assert( false );
00225       return 0;
00226 
00227    }
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 LadybugError 
00232 CompressorHeaderInfo::parse( 
00233                             const unsigned char*   pData, 
00234                             unsigned int           cols, 
00235                             unsigned int           rows, 
00236                             int                    bufferSize,
00237                             int*                   receivedDataSize)
00238 {
00239    INVALID_ARGUMENT_IF_NULL( pData );
00240 
00241    int iTempCount = 0;
00242 
00243    m_iTotalSize = 0;
00244    m_iNumImages = 0;
00245    memset( &m_arInfo, 0x0, sizeof( ImageInfo ) * COMPRESSOR_HEADER_MAX_IMAGES );
00246 
00247    m_pDataStart = pData;
00248 
00249    unsigned signature = 
00250       swab( *(unsigned*)&pData[ 16 + 0 ] );
00251    unsigned version  = swab( *(unsigned*)&pData[ 16 + 4 ] );
00252    
00253    //
00254    // Verify the version number
00255    //
00256    if( signature != LADYBUGIMAGEINFO_STRUCT_FINGERPRINT && version != 2 )
00257       return LADYBUG_JPEG_HEADER_ERROR;
00258    
00259    //
00260    // Get info for all JPEG images
00261    //
00262    iTempCount = 0;
00263    for( int i = 0; i < COMPRESSOR_HEADER_MAX_IMAGES; i++ )
00264    {
00265 
00266       m_arInfo[ i ].offset = 
00267          swab( *(unsigned*)( pData + 1024 - ( 24 - i ) * 8 + 0 ) );
00268       m_arInfo[ i ].size = 
00269          swab( *(unsigned*)( pData + 1024 - ( 24 - i ) * 8 + 4 ) );
00270 
00271       if( m_arInfo[ i ].offset + m_arInfo[ i ].size > (unsigned)m_iTotalSize )
00272             m_iTotalSize = m_arInfo[ i ].offset + m_arInfo[ i ].size;
00273 
00274       //if m_arInfo[ i ].size = 0 && m_arInfo[ i ].offset != 0, means image buffer
00275       //is too smal. In this case, m_arInfo[ i ].offset is actually the size of 
00276       //the this image data
00277       //The following is used to calculate the needed buffer size of this frame
00278       if ( m_arInfo[ i ].size != 0 )
00279              iTempCount += ( ( m_arInfo[ i ].size + 1024 ) / 1024 ) * 1024;
00280       else 
00281              iTempCount += ( ( m_arInfo[ i ].offset + 1024 ) / 1024 ) * 1024;
00282    }
00283 
00284    //
00285    // Add 1K space for master head
00286    //
00287    *receivedDataSize = iTempCount + 1024; 
00288 
00289    // Whenever the total size is bigger than the receiving buffer,
00290    // this image is not completed. Return an error indicating the 
00291    // buffer is too small.
00292    if ( *receivedDataSize > bufferSize )
00293       return LADYBUG_JPEG_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL;
00294 
00295   
00296    for(int i = 0; i < COMPRESSOR_HEADER_MAX_IMAGES; i++ )
00297    {
00298 
00299       unsigned int offset = m_arInfo[ i ].offset;
00300       unsigned int size = m_arInfo[ i ].size;
00301      
00302       if( size == 0 )
00303       {
00304          if ( offset == 0 )
00305             return LADYBUG_JPEG_INCOMPLETE_COMPRESSION;
00306          else
00307             return LADYBUG_JPEG_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL;
00308       }
00309       else
00310       {
00311          m_iNumImages++;
00312          m_arInfo[ i ].pData = pData + offset;
00313          //
00314          //Verify the Jpeg header
00315          //
00316          for (int j = 0; j < IMAGE_HEADER_SIZE; j++ )
00317             if ( !( (j > 0x18) && (j < 0x62) ) )
00318                if ( (unsigned char)(*(m_arInfo[ i ].pData + j)) != arImageHead[j])
00319                   return LADYBUG_JPEG_HEADER_ERROR;
00320          //
00321          //Check the JPEG Trailer
00322          //
00323          if ( ( (unsigned char)(*(m_arInfo[ i ].pData + size - 2)) != 0xFF ) ||
00324                     ( (unsigned char)(*(m_arInfo[ i ].pData + size - 1)) != 0xD9 ) )
00325                   return LADYBUG_JPEG_HEADER_ERROR;
00326 
00327          m_arInfo[ i ].jpegCols = 
00328             ( m_arInfo[ i ].pData[ 0x60 ] << 8 ) + m_arInfo[ i ].pData[ 0x61 ];
00329 
00330          m_arInfo[ i ].jpegRows = 
00331             ( m_arInfo[ i ].pData[ 0x5E ] << 8 ) + m_arInfo[ i ].pData[ 0x5F ];
00332         
00333          //Check 
00334          if( cols != 0 )
00335             if( m_arInfo[ i ].jpegCols != cols )
00336                // jpeg is wrong size.
00337                return LADYBUG_JPEG_HEADER_ERROR;
00338 
00339          if( rows != 0 )
00340             if( m_arInfo[ i ].jpegRows != rows )
00341                // jpeg is wrong size.
00342                return LADYBUG_JPEG_HEADER_ERROR;
00343       }
00344    }
00345    
00346    if( m_iNumImages == 0 )
00347       return LADYBUG_JPEG_NO_IMAGE;
00348 
00349    return LADYBUG_OK;
00350 }
00351 
00352  
00353 LadybugError 
00354 CompressorHeaderInfo::assembleJPEGHeaderInfo( const unsigned char*   pData) 
00355 {
00356    INVALID_ARGUMENT_IF_NULL( pData );
00357    m_iTotalSize = 0;
00358    m_iNumImages = 0;
00359 
00360    m_pDataStart = pData;
00361    
00362    //
00363    //Initialize the header info array
00364    //
00365    memset( &m_arInfo, 0x0, sizeof( ImageInfo ) * COMPRESSOR_HEADER_MAX_IMAGES );
00366  
00367    //
00368    //Get values for all the Jpeg headers
00369    //The image data pointed by pData has been parsed in parse(), so
00370    //It should not have JPEG header problem
00371    //
00372    for( int i = 0; i < COMPRESSOR_HEADER_MAX_IMAGES; i++ )
00373    {
00374       //Get the offset and size
00375       m_arInfo[ i ].offset = 
00376          swab( *(unsigned*)( pData + 1024 - ( 24 - i ) * 8 + 0 ) );
00377       m_arInfo[ i ].size = 
00378          swab( *(unsigned*)( pData + 1024 - ( 24 - i ) * 8 + 4 ) );
00379 
00380       if( m_arInfo[ i ].offset + m_arInfo[ i ].size > (unsigned)m_iTotalSize )
00381          m_iTotalSize = m_arInfo[ i ].offset + m_arInfo[ i ].size;
00382 
00383       //Get the data location
00384       m_arInfo[ i ].pData = pData + m_arInfo[ i ].offset;
00385 
00386       //Get rows and clumns of the Jpeg image
00387       m_arInfo[ i ].jpegCols = 
00388          ( m_arInfo[ i ].pData[ 0x60 ] << 8 ) + m_arInfo[ i ].pData[ 0x61 ];
00389       m_arInfo[ i ].jpegRows = 
00390          ( m_arInfo[ i ].pData[ 0x5E ] << 8 ) + m_arInfo[ i ].pData[ 0x5F ];
00391 
00392       m_iNumImages++;
00393      
00394    }
00395    
00396    return LADYBUG_OK;
00397 }
00398 
00399 
00400 const CompressorHeaderInfo::ImageInfo* 
00401 CompressorHeaderInfo::getInfo( int index ) const
00402 {
00403    if( index >= COMPRESSOR_HEADER_MAX_IMAGES )
00404    {
00405       assert( false );
00406       return NULL;
00407    }
00408 
00409    return &m_arInfo[ index ];
00410 }

00412 
00413 LadybugError 
00414 CompressorHeaderInfo::toImage( LadybugImage* pimage ) const
00415 {
00416    pimage->bStippled = true;
00417    pimage->dataFormat = LADYBUG_DATAFORMAT_COLOR_SEP_SEQUENTIAL_JPEG;
00418    pimage->pData = const_cast<unsigned char*>( m_pDataStart );
00419 
00420    pimage->uiDataSizeBytes = m_iTotalSize;
00421 
00422    switch( m_arInfo[ 0 ].jpegCols )
00423    {
00424    case 808:
00425       pimage->resolution = LADYBUG_RESOLUTION_1616x1216;
00426       pimage->uiCols = 1616;
00427       pimage->uiRows = 1216;
00428       break;
00429    case 608:
00430       pimage->resolution = LADYBUG_RESOLUTION_1216x1216;
00431       pimage->uiCols = 1216;
00432       pimage->uiRows = 1216;
00433       break;
00434    case 512:
00435       pimage->resolution = LADYBUG_RESOLUTION_1024x768;
00436       pimage->uiCols = 1024;
00437       pimage->uiRows = 768;
00438       break;
00439 
00440    default:
00441       //assert( false );
00442       //return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00443       pimage->resolution = LADYBUG_RESOLUTION_1024x768;
00444       pimage->uiCols = 1024;
00445       pimage->uiRows = 768;
00446       break;
00447    }
00448 
00449    return LADYBUG_OK;
00450 }
